feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.129.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(docs): Key Schema Tweaks by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3607
  • allow underscores in key schema by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3608
  • feat(org-settings): Option to hide certain products from the sidebar by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3609
  • feat(gateway): gateway support for identities by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3590
  • fix(auth): cli auth bug by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3612
  • improvement(sso-page): Add empty display for SSO general tab if no SSO is enabled by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3610

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.129.0-postgres...infisical/v0.129.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.130.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(project): Enable / Disable Secret Sharing by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3611
  • Org Products Padding Fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3619
  • fix(identities-auth): fixed kubernetes auth login by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3620
  • fix bundle endpoint for old certs by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3618
  • feat(secret-sharing): Specify Emails by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3616
  • fix secret rollback not tainting form by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3625
  • feat(org): Shared Secret limits for org by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3615
  • add product select to docs + change the heading by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3624
  • Allow Hyphens in k8s by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3627
  • fix(agent): exit code 1 on fetch secrets error by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3630
  • misc: add docs for Fortanix HSM by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3629
  • docs: k8s agent injector by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3626
  • fix(password-resets): allow password resets when users don't have a password set by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3631

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.129.1-postgres...infisical/v0.130.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.130.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat: license server changes by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3634
  • fix(k8s): disable clustergenerator watching in namespace scoped installations by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3635
  • feature(secret-rotation): Add support for LDAP target principal self-rotation and UPN by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.130.0-postgres...infisical/v0.130.1-postgres
